name: rogue-like-ig
description: This project is a browser-based, single-player rogue-like game created for the "Interactive Graphics" (Sapienza University of Rome, a.y. 2025-2026) in Three.js. You fight waves of goblin using your knife, tools and powerup, trying to survive as long as you can. The project is built with vanilla **Three.js** ES-modules—no frameworks, no build step—just clone, serve, and play.
